Count days between two dates

Source: R/utils.R
count_days.Rd

Count days between two dates

Usage

count_days(df, start, end, name)

Arguments

df

data frame

start

date column

end

date column

name

name of output column

Value

A tibble

Examples

generate_data(rows = 5) |>
tidyr::unnest(dates) |>
count_days(date_of_service, date_of_release, provider_lag)
#> # A tibble: 5 × 10
